attributes.title: Real Maple Syrup
attributes.description:
Created on February 24, 2010 by iamjason on Sourcemap.org:

I love real maple syrup, but you don't see too many sugar maple trees in California.

attributes.name: Real Maple Syrup
attributes.title: Real Maple Syrup
attributes.description: I love real maple syrup, but you don't see too many sugar maple trees in California.

attributes.name: 32 oz plastic bottle
attributes.title: 32 oz plastic bottle
attributes.description:
From:
http://www.thecompliancecenter.com/packaging/bottles-and-cans/plastic_containers.htm#p3200
0.6 kg per bottle
From:
http://timeforchange.org/plastic-bags-and-plastic-bottles-CO2-emissions
6 kg CO2 per kg of plastic
== 3.6kg

No idea were it would come from, but there are plastic manufacturers in Vermont, so guessing they get it local?

attributes.name: Maple Syrup
attributes.title: Maple Syrup
attributes.description:
Working from source:
http://www.newton.dep.anl.gov/askasci/gen01/gen01301.htm

32 oz = .25 gal
40:1 ratio sap to syrup;
2.73 kilowatt-hours per gallon to evaporate;
== 20.73 kwh
assuming natural gas, == 5.18 kg CO2 embodied.
